AudioWorklet.summary: The AudioWorklet interface of the Web Audio API is used to supply custom audio processing scripts that execute in a separate thread to provide very low latency audio processing.

remarks.para: The worklet's code is run in the global execution context, using a separate Web Audio thread which is shared by the worklet and other audio nodes.
Access the audio context's instance of AudioWorklet through the property.

- â€” the global execution context of an AudioWorklet
